questions.quote: Ok, now listen, I don't want any scenes in here like the last time.
He's not a Nazi. He just happens to be a little eccentric. Most geniuses are.
Ahh! Mr. Ross. Mrs. Ross. My name is Cosmo and I'll be your driver for this evening. We have blankets for your comfort. I also have hot chocolate if the mood should strike you.
He asked about me? John Kennedy asked about me?!  What did he say?
Well, I wouldn't want you to do that. You know there's a lot of losers out there.
What are we, John Dillinger? How did this get to be the crime of the century? It's not like we stuck a broomstick in her spokes and she went flying...
Let me ask you this. If you stick your hand in the hair is it easy to get it out?
I think your taking the trash out for this chicken place, but that couldn't be.
Oh, Anthony Quinn, fine actor. But from what I understand, not a very good driver. Hits everything on the road. But always leaves a note.
Jerry, do you want a flat edge on this molding or do you want me to bevel it?
